problem.markdown:
Select all answers below that are true about large scale distributed computing: [x] Distrubuted computing is a good application for Google searches. [] Distrubuted computing can be run on a single computer. [] Modern smartphones can run quickly because they have distributed computing algorithms on them. [x] Distributed computing is often utilized to help compute larger tasks.
[explanation] Due to the amount of Google searches, Google needs distrubuted computing. Distributed computing is defined as multiple computers working towards one solution. [explanation]
problem.p: Select all answers below that are true about large scale distributed computing:

checkboxgroup.choice: Distrubuted computing is a good application for Google searches.
Distrubuted computing can be run on a single computer.
Modern smartphones can run quickly because they have distributed computing algorithms on them.
Distributed computing is often utilized to help compute larger tasks.

div.p: Due to the amount of Google searches, Google needs distrubuted computing.
Distributed computing is defined as multiple computers working towards one solution.
